sentences.en: ...the reflection of a beam of light off a mirror.
A moment’s reflection will show the stupidity of this argument.
sentences.cn: 只需认真想一下便可看出这种观点多么愚蠢。

sentences.en: A moment's reflection will show you are wrong.
sentences.cn: 只要略加考虑就可看出你错了.

sentences.en: After days of reflection she decided to write back.
sentences.cn: 想了几天之后她决定回信。

sentences.en: Can you see your reflection in the glass?
sentences.cn: 你能看到玻璃里你的影像吗？

sentences.en: Carrie found ample food for reflection in the fifty - dollar proposition.
sentences.cn: 这个50块钱的要求让嘉莉想了很多.

sentences.en: He admired his reflection in the mirror.
sentences.cn: 他欣赏着自己在镜中的影像。

sentences.en: He didn't speak much, but what he said affords much food for reflection.
sentences.cn: 他的话虽然不多, 却耐人寻味.

sentences.en: I couldn't bear to see my reflection in the mirror.
sentences.cn: 我不忍看镜子里自己的样子。

sentences.en: Infection with head lice is no reflection on personal hygiene.
sentences.cn: 头上生虱子并不说明不讲个人卫生。

sentences.en: Inhibition in adulthood seems to be a reflection of a person's experiences as a child.
sentences.cn: 成年期的压抑似乎是一个人童年经历的一种反映。

sentences.en: On reflection, he says, he very much regrets the comments.
sentences.cn: 经过反省，他说自己对所作的评论感到非常后悔。

sentences.en: One can see the reflection of the tower in the water.
The library is unique and its break-up would be a sad reflection on the value we place on our heritage.
sentences.cn: 这个图书馆很特别，若将它关闭，会让人怀疑我们是否珍视传统。

sentences.en: The water is so clear that you can see your reflection in it.
This is a reflection of their frailty.
This is a reflection upon your honour.
sentences.cn: 这对你的名誉是一种损害.

sentences.en: This matter is a reflection on me.
This mess is a poor reflection on his competence.
sentences.cn: 这种混乱情况说明他难当此任.
